author: Craig Wassell
content:
We hired DB for my Squid Game–themed…

We hired DB for my Squid Game–themed hen party, and they were absolutely incredible from start to finish! The team was so friendly, professional, and made everything completely stress-free. The assault course bouncy castle was the perfect addition to our theme – it looked amazing, was so much fun, and kept everyone entertained all day.Delivery and set-up were seamless, and they went above and beyond to make sure everything was safe and ready to go. All of my guests were raving about how brilliant it was, and it honestly made the whole party feel extra special.I can’t recommend db entertainment highly enough – if you’re looking for a reliable, fun, and genuinely lovely company to work with, these are your people! Thank you so much for helping make my hen party unforgettabl
